idea-plugin.name: JavaPOT
idea-plugin.description: JavaPOT is a grammar pre-processor for JavaCUP. It supports optional (?), zero-or-more (*), one-or-more (+) and nested alterntives (|) on the right hand side and works with AST class generation instead of embedded actions. JavaPOT is only available as an IntelliJ plugin and should be used together with a JFlex-generated Lexer.
